name: Max Effort Ramp to 1RM — ~15 min
time_per_session_breakdown: 5-8 progressively heavier singles, ~2 min rest each ≈15 min
overview_and_execution: After warm-ups, ramp up in singles to find a daily or weekly 1RM. Stop if form breaks down or if you fail. Rotate main lift variation each 1-2 weeks.
example_application: Box Squat ramp: 135×5, 225×3, 315×1, 365×1, 385×1 (max). Next session: choose a slight variation or go heavier if recovered.
important_notes: Requires good technique and spotters. Typically used by advanced lifters. Very taxing; limit volume or add accessory after.
volume_metrics: 1-2 top singles per session, plus warm-ups
